attributes.action: Stand by the EU referendum result. It's not the winning it's the taking part.
attributes.additional_details:
Happy with the result or not. Respect the decision of the voters and accept the result so we can move onwards and upwards.

A positive mind brings positive results.
attributes.background: The EU referendum result is a result. You chose to vote or not to vote. Respect the outcome. Stop all this anger, name calling and arguing. Dont blame others for the result. Adults young and old had a choice. Yes it was close but it was one referendum not the best out of three referendum.
